thread.section_title: DID Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DID | www.did.ie | 2 of 41
thread.title: DES LAWLOR

author: DES LAWLOR
title: DES LAWLOR
text: I'd purchased a TV that developed a fault so I went to DID and John the assistant said to drop it in and he'd test it. Strangely enough the TV worked perfectly which was embarrassing for me. John with a smile on his face told me not to worry to leave the unit with him so he could keep an eye on it. Within an hour he'd phoned me to say the TV was faulty and he'd have another waiting for me to collect. John was courteous and professional at all times. Brilliant customer service well done John and DID.
